title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When a report parameter is created with a list box display type, and a default value is set for the list box, modifying the default value causes it to be lost.
EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained even after modifying it.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display Type to List Box. 2. Enter three values (for example, 'aa', 'bb', 'cc') and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the default value 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again and observe that the default value is lost.
